Rodenpicula: Ah, but what is done is done. In any event, in order to imbue the weak Metusela Kamael with greater strength, our creators turned to the closely-related Spicula Kamael -- more specifically, me, the only female Spicula. A piece of my essence was grafted onto your souls, slowly increasing your power. Even the female Metusela Kamael, originally designed simply for the perpetuation of the race, learned to wield a sword and to shoot a bow.
